original_text: The priest will shake the blood over the person who had the disease. He will do this seven times. The priest will then say that the person is clean. The priest will let the live bird go. It will fly away.
korean_text: 나병에서 정결함을 받을 자에게 일곱 번 뿌려 정하다 하고 그 살아 있는 새는 들에 놓을지며

sentences.original_text: The priest will shake the blood
over the person who had the disease
He will do this seven times
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이것을 일곱 번 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The priest will let the live bird go
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 살아있는 새를 놓아 줄 것입니다
